name: LowPolyValley
description:
I made this scene for testing purposes and I would like people to check it out en give me some feedback on it.

You'll need a Oculus Rift (DK2), the latest PC runtime (V.0.8.0.0-beta) and a Oculus-ready PC (x64).

The orientation might be off when you start it. (you should be facing the two little guys) You can use the mouse to change your orientation but don't use it look around.

The sound of the plane works very well as spatialized audio but I couldn't package the game with the UE4 oculus-audio plugin. Hopefully I can get that to work.
